detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__97.sol#55-61):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__97.sol#59)

Low level call in Address._functionCallWithValue(address,bytes,uint256,string) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__97.sol#121-142):
	- (success,returndata) = target.call{value: weiValue}(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__97.sol#125)

ERC20.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__97.sol#472-480) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 1000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERC20__97.sol#477)
